thread.title: Here’s everything Emma Stone has worn on her “La La Land” press tour — prepare yourself for serious style envy
thread.title_full: Here’s everything Emma Stone has worn on her “La La Land” press tour — prepare yourself for serious style envy

author: Johnni Macke
title: Here’s everything Emma Stone has worn on her “La La Land” press tour — prepare yourself for serious style envy

locations.name: new york state of mind this

organizations.name: paul treadway / barcroft images / barcroft media

text:
Here’s everything Emma Stone has worn on her “La La Land” press tour — prepare yourself for serious style envy Leave it to Emma Stone to give us major style envy while promoting her film La La Land . Okay, even if Stone wasn’t promoting her new musical movie, we’d be envious of her style , but that’s a story for another day.
Beginning back in August, the 28-year-old actress began her La La Land press tour and every look she’s worn has been amazing. Honestly, it’s not even fair how fabulous her wardrobe is at times.
We’ve rounded up all of Stone’s looks from the Golden Globe winning film below. Prepare to be super jealous and instantly want to revamp your wardrobe.
Flower Power Stone kicked off her La La Land press tour — or as we like to call it her ~very glam fashion tour~ — at the Venice Film Festival in this stunning number. The flower-printed frock is the perfect summer dress (it was in August) and we’re loving the green and pink combo.
John Rasimus / Barcroft Images / Barcroft Media via Getty Images Glitter Goddess When in Italy, do as the glamorous Italians do? While attending the opening ceremony for the Venice Film Festival, the Arizona native stole the show. She rocked this chic, silver-striped glitter gown that makes her look like Cinderella.
Paul Treadway / Barcroft Images / Barcroft Media via Getty Images Mustard is a Must Who knew mustard could be such a fierce color? Oh, and she’s wearing a sweater skirt…what could be better?
Vera Anderson/WireImage/Getty Images Mary Jane Alert We don’t know what it is about this Toronto International Film Festival look, but it gives off major school-girl vibes — in the best way possible.
Walter McBride/FilmMagic/Getty Images Black and White Delight Calling all fashionistas, this is the way to wear white. While attending the Mill Valley Film Festival in October, Stone radiated beauty with this lace-adorned frock.
Kelly Sullivan/Getty Images Hollywood Glam Although Stone wore this flapper-feeling dress in Denver, it gives us major old Hollywood vibes . It doesn’t hurt that she capped it off with a pop of red on her lip.
Thomas Cooper/Getty Images Velvet is Forever The Crazy, Stupid, Love star donned this edgy number at Lionsgate’s screening of her LA-based film in November. The use of velvet, and puffy sleeves is SO ’80s, but we love it just the same.
Michael Tran/FilmMagic/Getty Images Print Style This is our new favorite summer style , even if Stone wore it in November. The print is gorgeous.
Todd Williamson/Getty Images New York State of Mind This is actual coat goals in our minds. The Gangster Squad actress stepped out in NYC for a Good Morning America appearance in a black-and-white look that is ideal for the winter months.
Raymond Hall/GC Images/Getty Images Blue Dress Baby Hello, gorgeous! This blue sheer gown with jewel detailing screams retro Los Angeles. PS: look at those sassy heels.
Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic/Getty Images Golden Girl Okay, so technically this wasn’t press for La La Land , but it was when Stone had her hand and footprint ceremony for the movie, so it counts. Plus, we couldn’t ignore this flowy, golden dress. It is perfect for making your TCL Chinese Theater footprint debut.
Jeffrey Mayer/WireImage/Getty Images Here’s another look at the golden goddess look Stone donned as she signed her name. Side note: Ryan Gosling looks so dreamy here.
Jeffrey Mayer/WireImage/Getty Images Statement Dress in Paris The red-haired beauty attended the Paris premiere in January for her new film and her dress was show-stopping. Look at the texture and warm winter colors. She looks both chic and elegant.
Marc Piasecki/WireImage/Getty Images Which of Stone’s La La Land press tour looks is your favorite?
